sentence.text: Instead , the selectors opted for Peter Richardson , who silenced the critics by qualifying for Barcelona but suffered a first round knockout by Stone 12 months ago .
The 23-year-old Scot silenced a growing band of critics with an impressive 9-5 victory over James Wattana .

He silenced her with a kiss .
